query: I'm on a managed Mac and Homebrew Python install is blocked. Can we still set this up safely?
expected_behavior: Runs detection gates and confirms macOS
Identifies that primary Homebrew Python path is blocked
Switches to pyenv as fallback (not default path)
Uses selected interpreter for venv/package flow
Avoids system Python rewiring and forbidden commands

quality_criteria.fallback_policy: pyenv used only after primary path is blocked
